/****** [ aps.dynamic.purOrderScheduleSelect ] ******/ BEGIN DECLARE @V_CUR_DATE NVARCHAR(8) = CONVERT(NVARCHAR, DBO.UFN_GETDATE(), 112);
SELECT ISNULL(A.ITEM_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_CD , ISNULL(A.ITEM_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_CD_NM , ISNULL(A.ITEM_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_NM , ISNULL(A.ITEM_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_NM_NM , ISNULL(A.SPEC, ' ') AS SPEC , ISNULL(A.SPEC, ' ') AS SPEC_NM , ISNULL(A.ITEM_TYPE_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_TYPE_CD , ISNULL(A.ITEM_TYPE_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_TYPE_CD_NM , ISNULL(A.PROCUR_TYPE, ' ') AS PROCUR_TYPE , ISNULL(A.PROCUR_TYPE, ' ') AS PROCUR_TYPE_NM , A.SALES_PRICE_KRW AS SALES_PRICE_KRW , A.SALES_PRICE_KRW AS SALES_PRICE_KRW_NM , A.PUR_LT AS PUR_LT , A.PUR_LT AS PUR_LT_NM , ISNULL(A.ITEM_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP_CD , ISNULL(A.ITEM_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP_CD_NM , ISNULL(A.ITEM_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP_NM , ISNULL(A.ITEM_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP_NM_NM , A.SS_QTY AS SS_QTY , A.SS_QTY AS SS_QTY_NM , ISNULL(A.MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE, ' ') AS MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE , ISNULL(A.MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE, ' ') AS MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE_NM , A.SEQ AS SEQ , A.SEQ AS SEQ_NM , ISNULL(A.PO_NO, ' ') AS PO_NO , ISNULL(A.PO_NO, ' ') AS PO_NO_NM , ISNULL( A.BP_CD, ' ') AS BP_CD , ISNULL( A.BP_CD, ' ') AS BP_CD_NM , ISNULL(A.BP_NM, ' ') AS BP_NM , ISNULL(A.BP_NM, ' ') AS BP_NM_NM , ISNULL(A.HANDOVER_DATE, ' ') AS HANDOVER_DATE , ISNULL(A.HANDOVER_DATE, ' ') AS HANDOVER_DATE_NM , A.REMAIN_QTY AS PO_REMAIN_QTY , A.REMAIN_QTY AS PO_REMAIN_QTY_NM , ISNULL(A.ORIGINAL_DATE, ' ') AS ORIGINAL_DATE , ISNULL(A.ORIGINAL_DATE, ' ') AS ORIGINAL_DATE_NM , ISNULL(A.SCHED_DATE_PRE_RECV, ' ') AS SCHED_DATE_PRE_RECV -- 입하 예정 일자 , ISNULL(A.SCHED_DATE_PRE_RECV, ' ') AS SCHED_DATE_PRE_RECV_NM , ISNULL(A.SCHED_DATE_ORG, ' ') AS SCHED_DATE_ORG -- 입고 예정 일자 , ISNULL(A.SCHED_DATE_ORG, ' ') AS SCHED_DATE_ORG_NM , ISNULL(A.SCHED_DATE, ' ') AS SCHED_DATE , ISNULL(A.SCHED_DATE, ' ') AS SCHED_DATE_NM , A.SCHED_QTY AS SCHED_QTY , A.SCHED_QTY AS SCHED_QTY_NM , ISNULL(A.REMARK, ' ') AS REMARK , ISNULL(A.REMARK, ' ') AS REMARK_NM , ISNULL(A.PO_DATE, ' ') AS PO_DATE , ISNULL(A.PO_DATE, ' ') AS PO_DATE_NM FROM ( SELECT MI.ITEM_CD , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.SPEC , CASE WHEN 'KO' = UPPER('ko') THEN MC2.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'CN' = UPPER('ko') THEN MC2.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC2.CODE_NM END AS ITEM_TYPE_CD , CASE WHEN 'KO' = UPPER('ko') THEN MC3.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'CN' = UPPER('ko') THEN MC3.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC3.CODE_NM END AS PROCUR_TYPE , ISNULL(MICG.SALES_PRICE_KRW, MI.ITEM_COST_KRW) AS SALES_PRICE_KRW , MC2.CODE_CD AS ITEM_TYPE , MIP.PUR_LT , MI.ITEM_GROUP_CD , MIG.UPPER_ITEM_GROUP_CD , MIG.ITEM_GROUP_NM , MIP.SS_QTY , MGSD.MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE AS MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE_CD , CASE WHEN 'KO' = UPPER('ko') THEN MC4.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'CN' = UPPER('ko') THEN MC4.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC4.CODE_NM END AS MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.BU_CD, MI.ITEM_CD ORDER BY MGSD.SORT, MGSD.PO_NO, MGSD.PO_SEQ, MGSD.ORG_DATE, MGSD.SEQ) AS SEQ , MGSD.PO_NO , MGSD.BP_CD , MGSD.BP_NM , MGSD.HANDOVER_DATE , MGSD.REMAIN_QTY , MGSD.ORG_DATE AS ORIGINAL_DATE , MGSD.SCHED_DATE_PRE_RECV , MGSD.SCHED_DATE_ORG , MGSD.SCHED_DATE , MGSD.SCHED_QTY , MGSD.REMARK , MIP.PROCUR_TYPE AS PROCUR_TYPE_CD , MGSD.PO_DATE FROM TB_MST_ITEM MI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TB_MST_ITEM_PLANT MIP WITH(NOLOCK) ON MIP.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MIP.BU_CD = MI.BU_CD AND MIP.PLANT_CD = 'WF01' AND MIP.ITEM_CD = MI.ITEM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_REP_CUST MRC WITH(NOLOCK) ON MRC.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MRC.BU_CD = MI.BU_CD AND MRC.REP_CUST_CD = MI.REP_CUST_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CUSTOMER MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC.COMPANY_CD = MRC.COMPANY_CD AND MC.BU_CD = MRC.BU_CD AND MC.CUST_CD = MRC.REP_CUST_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MAP_ITEM_CUST_GROUP MICG WITH(NOLOCK) ON MICG.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MICG.BU_CD = MI.BU_CD AND MICG.ITEM_CD = MI.ITEM_CD AND MICG.CUST_GROUP_CD = MC.CUST_GROUP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_ITEM_GROUP MIG WITH(NOLOCK) ON MIG.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MIG.BU_CD = MI.BU_CD AND MIG.ITEM_GROUP_CD = MI.ITEM_GROUP_CD INNER JOIN UV_MAT_GR_SCHED_DAILY MGSD WITH(NOLOCK) ON MGSD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MGSD.BU_CD = MI.BU_CD AND MGSD.YYYYMMDD = @{fromCal2} AND MGSD.ITEM_CD = MI.ITEM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC2.BU_CD = 'ALL' AND MC2.GROUP_CD = 'ITEM_TYPE' AND MC2.CODE_CD = MI.ITEM_TYPE AND MC2.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC3.BU_CD = 'ALL' AND MC3.GROUP_CD = 'PROCUR_TYPE' AND MC3.CODE_CD = MIP.PROCUR_TYPE AND MC3.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC4 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC4.BU_CD = MGSD.BU_CD AND MC4.GROUP_CD = 'MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE' AND MC4.CODE_CD = MGSD.MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE AND MC4.USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A WHERE 1 = 1 #if($_parameter.item_nm and $_parameter.item_nm != "" ) AND (A.ITEM_CD LIKE '%'+@{item_nm}+'%' OR A.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'+@{item_nm}+'%') #end #if($_parameter.customer and $_parameter.customer != "" ) AND (A.BP_NM LIKE '%'+@{customer}+'%' OR A.BP_CD LIKE '%'+@{customer}+'%') #end #if($_parameter.poNo and $_parameter.poNo != "" ) AND A.PO_NO LIKE '%'+@{poNo}+'%' #end #if($_parameter.procurType and $_parameter.procurType != "" ) AND A.PROCUR_TYPE_CD IN ('$_parameter.procurType.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.itemType and $_parameter.itemType != "" ) AND A.ITEM_TYPE IN ('$_parameter.itemType.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.materialArrivalType and $_parameter.materialArrivalType != "" ) AND A.MATERIAL_ARRIVAL_TYPE_CD IN ('$_parameter.materialArrivalType.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.upItemGroup and $_parameter.upItemGroup != "" ) AND A.UPPER_ITEM_GROUP_CD IN ('$_parameter.upItemGroup.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.itemGroup and $_parameter.itemGroup != "" ) AND A.ITEM_GROUP_CD IN ('$_parameter.itemGroup.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.fromCal and $_parameter.fromCal != "" and $_parameter.toCal and $_parameter.toCal != "") AND A.SCHED_DATE BETWEEN @{fromCal} AND @{toCal} #end ORDER BY A.ITEM_CD, A.PO_NO,A.SEQ END;
